name: Multi Racing
description:
Real racing - High speed - Real drifting

FEATURES 
• 99 natural maps
• 9 classic cars: Truck, Bus, Van, Sedan, Buggy...

• Fantastic graphics quality

• RAM: 2 GB 
• Benchmark: 30k
